document.full_text: a new food safety scandal erupted in china this week, this time over pigs in central henan province that were fed an illegal additive believed to speed up muscle growth and burn fat, resulting in leaner pork.
document.title: asia: china: pigs fed illegal additive
lines_and_colors: a new food safety scandal erupted in china this week, this time over pigs in central henan province that were fed an illegal additive believed to speed up muscle growth and burn fat, resulting in leaner pork.
